summary: Comprehensive testing of Pinterest-style trading platform completed. Backend APIs working at 95.7% success rate, admin functions 100% operational, frontend authentication and routing working correctly. All 10 default categories present, category requests functional, global search operational, and core trading features verified.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 422 instead of expected 400 for missing file parameter
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - endpoint validation works but status code differs from expectation

passed_tests: Landing page loads correctly with proper branding and navigation
Authentication protection working - unauthenticated users redirected from protected routes
Categories endpoint returns all 10 default categories (electronics, clothing, books, furniture, sports, toys, collectibles, music, games, art)
Category request submission works for authenticated users
Global search endpoint functional for authenticated users with proper results
Admin stats endpoint working - shows user, item, trade, and category counts
Admin user management - list users, search users functional
Admin item management - list items, search items functional
Admin category management - list, create, delete categories working
User suspension/unsuspension working with proper 403 error for suspended users
Pinning items works and updates boost score correctly
Trade creation and confirmation workflow functional
User profile shows trade points and rating correctly
